titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4156) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-448, by Mr. McGovern.
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 155.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 818.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 185 (Roll no. 1103).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 190 (Roll no. 1104).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/14/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 4156 (Orderly and Responsible Iraq Redeployment Appropriations Act, 2008).
